Guardian Sword extracted from Breath of the Wild. The energy blade texture wasn't assigned (UV mapping was there for it) so I assigned it as using the texure is better than a white mesh.

Moderator note:
Model checked in Blender and View3dScene. Only one UV map seen in Blender.

Tools
Switch Toolbox by KillzXGaming
Blender 2.78c

AJD-262
Jan 26 2021
